item.description:
Being led by Greg McKay from The Boston Peeps:


HarborArts Outdoor Gallery at Boston Harbor Shipyard

OPENING CELEBRATION Meet the Artists

Saturday, June 12, 2-5pm


Directions: MBTA Blue Line to Maverick Station or City Water Taxi to Boston Harbor Shipyard (617) 422.0392 or visit www.citywatertaxi.com. For additional information please visit www.harborarts.net

HarborArts OPEN HOUSE

in conjunction with Common Boston in East Boston

Saturday, June 19, 11am to 4pm
item.name: HarborArts Outdoor Gallery at Boston Harbor Shipyard: 2-5pm
